remarks: The symmetric group induces a group action on its base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
symgga.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` X ) $.
symgga.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symgga.f $e |- F = ( f e. B , x e. X |-> ( f ` x ) ) $.
symgga $p |- ( X e. V -> F e. ( G GrpAct X ) ) $.
$d B f x $.
$d G f x $.
$d V f x $.
$d X f x $.
